tool.name: NEAL
tool.description: Nature+Energy Audio Labeller audio data annotation tool
tool.command:
#import re #for $count, $file in enumerate($input): #set $cleaned_name = str($count + 1) + '_' + re.sub('[^\w\-\.\s]', '_', str($file.element_identifier)) cp '$file' '/opt/shiny-server/samples/sample-apps/audio/www/tmp/${cleaned_name}' && #end for
chown shiny.shiny /var/log/shiny-server &&
exec shiny-server >> /var/log/shiny-server.log 2>&1

param.name: input
param.label: Input sound data file(s) in wav format

param.name: inputlabel
param.label: Input sound data label file in csv format

tool.help:
`NEAL (Nature+Energy Audio Labeller) <https://github.com/gibbona1/neal>`_ is an open-source interactive audio data annotation tool based on R Shiny.
